```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
f <- sample(100:1000, 2)

ans <- signif(abs(f[1] - f[2]))

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE, digits = 0)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%g Hz", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
A `r f[1]` Hz pure tone is played at the same time as a `r f[2]` Hz pure tone. What beat frequency will be produced?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The beat frequency is

$$ f_{beat} = |f_2 - f_1| = |`r f[1]` \,\mathsf{Hz} - `r f[2]` \,\mathsf{Hz}| = `r ans` \,\mathsf{Hz}$$
